Description: Book of the Dead of Userhat; frame 1; full colour vignettes; cursive Hieroglyphic text; yellow borders.
Curator's comments: See also .9962 Published: Lucarelli, Rita. 2015. The inhabitants of the Fourteenth Hill of Spell 149 of the Book of the Dead. In Morenz, Ludwig D. and Amr El Hawary (eds). Weitergabe: Festschrift für die Ägyptologin Ursula Rößler-Köhler zum 65. Geburtstag, 275-291. Weisbaden: Harrassowitz.
